text: Gabriel Ramanantsoa (13 April 1906 Antananarivo - 9 May 1979 Paris) was an Malagasy politician. He was the President and Prime Minister of Madagascar from 1972 to 1975. He died in Paris from a heart attack, aged 73. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Presidents of Madagascar Category:Prime ministers of Madagascar Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Gabriel Ramanantsoa
